amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 as en bloc No. 6: Nos. 125, 126, 131, 218, 251, 310, 382, 410, and 418.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendments (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A034) offered by Mr. Smith (WA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
